title: [ready] General documentation improvements
body_html:
This closes the proposal in #5432.

The idea of the PR is to improve existing documentation.

Changes made:

  1. Modify Tensor operations docs.
  2. Modify torch.nn* docs (excluding functional).

Types of Changes made:

  1. Fix math errors
  2. Add formulae
  3. Improve description if required

If these changes are acceptable, I could look at the rest of the documentation and clean it up in the same way.

body:
This closes the proposal in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5432.

The idea of the PR is to improve existing documentation.

### Changes made:
1. Modify Tensor operations docs.
2. Modify `torch.nn*` docs (excluding `functional`).

### Types of Changes made:
1. Fix math errors
2. Add formulae
3. Improve description if required

If these changes are acceptable, I could look at the rest of the documentation and clean it up in the same way.
